scripts.test: TRYORAMA_LOG_LEVEL=debug WASM_LOG=debug RUST_LOG="debug,p2p_event_task:dispatch_holochain_p2p_event=error,get_links=error,p2p_event_task=error,wasmer_compiler_cranelift=error,holochain::core::workflow=error,holochain::conductor::entry_def_store=error" RUST_BACKTRACE=1 node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node index.ts
scripts.build-test: cd ../../ && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --features test && hc dna pack workdir && cd zomes/tests && npm test
